sourceDesc.p:
If Chinese, the text below is based on the Taishō text from the CBETA-Database (Version Feb.2006). If Pāli, the text base is the VRI Chaṭṭa Saṅgāyana edition (ver.3). If Sanskrit the text base is Enomoto, Fumio 榎本文雄 (1994): A comprehensive study of the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama: Indic texts corresponding to the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama as found in the Sarvāstivāda-Mūlasarvāstivāda literature. Kyoto: Kacho Junior College
and other scholarly publications (as referenced). English translations by Marcus Bingenheimer.

projectDesc.p: This file has been created in the project "A Digital Comparative Edition of the Bieyi za ahan jing" conducted at the Chung-hwa Institute for Buddhist Studies 中華佛學研究所 and the Dharma Drum Buddhist College 法鼓佛教研修學院. The project was funded by the Chiang Ching-kuo Foundation for International Scholarly Exchange 蔣經國國際學術交流基金會. The aim of the project was to produce a comparative digital edition and partial translation of the 364 sutras of the BZA and their parallels. In the original interface, the texts were kept in an eXist database and are realized via XQuery and XSLT as HTML for the online user. The project lasted from 2005-2009.

div.head: tsa ndra sū tra
zla ba'i mdo
div.p: From the Derge edition. Derge 331. This is part of the text-cluster of BZA (T.100) sutra 167.
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa can na 'gro po'i rdzid bu'i 'gram na bzhugs te/

de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'od kyis bkab par gyur to/ de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de skrag cing dngangs la mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der songs ste phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mko bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug to/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/

lg.l: kun las rnam par rab grol ba'i/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/
gnod pa dag dang phrad gyur pa/ bdag gi skyabs ni mdzad par gsol/
'jig rten dgra bcom bde gshegs la/ zla ba skyabs su mchi lags kyis/
sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs brtse rnams/ zla ba thar mdzed sgra gcan las/
sgra gcan zla ba mun sel ba/ nam mkha' dag la 'od byed cing/
lam mer 'dug la dkar ba dang/ rnam par dag pa'i 'od ldan pa/
bar snang dag la ma bzung bar/ skyed dgu'i sgron de myur du thong/
de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan de/ lus kyang rngul cing skrag gyur la/
nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/ zla ba rnam par gtod bar byed/

div.p: de nas rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan rings pa bas kyang rings par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor btang ba mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/

lg.l: ci yi phyir na sgra gcan khyod/ lus kyang rngul cing skrag gyur la/
nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/ rings par zla ba gtong bar byed/
sangs rgyas tshigs bcad 'di brjod pas/ gal te zla ba ma btang na/
bdag gi mgo bo tshal bdun 'gas/ gson yang bde bar mi 'gyur ro/

div.p: rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos smras pa/

lg.l: kye ma bden pa gzigs pa yi/ sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba rmad/
de dag gis ni tshigs su bcad/ brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gtong/
